11      Isaacman.
12            These are text messages between you and

18 A.   Yes.

    10 Q.  And looking at the bottom two messages on this
    11     page, Mr. Miller says to you, quote, "You have to

14 Q.   Do you see at the bottom two messages on this page,
    15      Mr. Miller says to you, "You have to be willing to
    16      sell the company for a lot of money. You need a
    17      number."
    18           Do you see that?
    19 A.   I do.
    20 Q.   And then your response is, "I'm not a Seller at
    21      any price. Please respect that. I will entertain
    22      buying."

Hey Frank-

Congrats on the fantastic close and analyst day.  Pretty amazing. Also, great to hear the
CardConnect integration is going well.

With respect to your inquiry, yes - we are working though many complexities but it is
manageable.   I do believe there could be some real benefits to our organizations working
together which has become more apparent as we embrace the regulated gaming world (which is
desperate for a better payment solution).  I'd rather spend more time getting to know each other
and finding areas we can create value together before the distractions that accompany a
transaction. I also have absolutely no idea how our regulator friends, that come with the gaming
license, would react to putting our organizations together so there is a lot of diligence there.
 That shouldn't stop us from getting together in the meantime.

Best,
Jared

progress. Getting married
